articles.description: Kyle Whiting ran to a police officer's aid with the barber's cape still draped over his shoulders.

articles.description: Lord Peter Mandelson will be the UK's next ambassador to the US, an appointment he describes as "a great honour".

articles.description: The sentences range from three to sixteen years, in a case which started with an online hate campaign.
articles.title: Eight sentenced in France for actions that led to teacher beheading

articles.title: E-bikes: Battery fire destroys family home days before Christmas

articles.title: Manchester Airport: Charges over fight with police caught on CCTV
